title: Mutua Kilai, PhD
text:
I am a Lecturer in the Department of Pure and Applied Sciences ,School of Pure and Applied Sciences at Kirinyaga University
My Research and teaching focus on:

Statistical Modeling
Mathematical Statistics
Data Science
Machine Learning
Spatial Statistics

I am an author and maintainer of the following three R packages

NovelDistns
rKenyaForex
AHSurv

Creator of the following Overleaf Latex Template KyU Thesis Template
I also provide statistical consultancies including statistical and methodological services at an affordable fee.

title: Lecture Notes
text:
Below is a list of the courses i have taught under various levels.
This combines both theoretical and practical courses i have taught at the following Universities Kirinyaga University and JKUAT.


Kirinyaga University

Post-Graduate

SDS 3122 Programming for Data Science
STA 3111 Theory of Estimation
STA 3102 Theory of Linear Models



Undergraduate

STA 2467 Statistical Model Building
HES 2213 Design and Analysis of Experiments II
SPS 2349 Tests of Hypothesis
SPA 2405 Survival Analysis




JKUAT University

Undergraduate

STA 2205 Statistical Programming
STA 2416 Statistical Computing
STA 2203 Time Series Analysis
STA 2440 Econometrics
STA 2432 Principles of Linear Models
STA 2430 Statistical Quality Control

title: Consulting Services
text:
Since 2018 i have worked as an independent statistical consultant for nonprofit community organizations. The experiences working with range of different clients, providing scientific expertise and being able to explain technical concepts and be able to communicate results clearly.

title: Introduction to R
text:
This gives a brief on how to install both R and RStudio.
R is a powerful programming language and software that is widely used for statistical computing, data analysis, visualization and reporting.
To install R click here
To install RStudio click here
For convenience when working with R, you could prefer to use R Projects.


The goal of this resource is to provide you with basic R concepts.

R Basics
Importing and Exporting Data
Data Manipulation
Data Visualization

For more resources, kindly consult:

R For Data Science
